div.p: Codes for the Representation of Names of Languages Part 2: Alpha-3 Code. Used as part of the IETF 3066 specification for languages throughout the HL7 specification.
DeprecationComment: This code system is being deprecated, as the OID identifying it has been replaced with the correct ISO OID of 1.0.639.2
